title: Was the wall of President Trump designed for the benefit of a Russian king?
subtitle: A series of letters provided a series of questionable assertions about the border wall signed by President Trump and Russian steel Magnet Roman Abramovich.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: President Trump ' s border wall project will necessarily pay a large sum for the few strong Russian oligarchs and the steel bone Roman Abramovich because of specific requirements imposed by Trump.
